name: Absolute Zero
description: Keep the cold temperature steady to heal allies.

skills.normal_des:
While on the ground, swing the staff to attack 5 times in a row.
First Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK + <shuzhi>{1}</>.
Second Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK + <shuzhi>{3}</>.
Third Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{4}%</> of ATK + <shuzhi>{5}</>.
Fourth Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{6}%</> of ATK + <shuzhi>{7}</>.
Fifth Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{8}%</> of ATK + <shuzhi>{9}</>.
skills.dodge: Dodge right before getting hit to activate a Phantasia, which reduces the speed of enemies within the area. Cooldown: 15 seconds. While dodging, you gain hitstun immunity for <shuzhi>0.5</> seconds.
skills.skill: Create a healing zone that moves with the Wanderer and heals nearby allies for <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK + <shuzhi>{1}</> once every <shuzhi>0.5</> seconds for <shuzhi>6</> seconds. <shuzhi>60</>-second cooldown.
skills.discharge: When <red>weapon charge</> is full or <red>Phantasia</> is triggered, switching to this weapon from another weapon <shuzhi>removes all debuffs from the wielder</>, and the staff continues to remove debuffs from the Wanderer and allies, plus healing nearby Wanderers and allies for <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK + <shuzhi>{3}</> HP for <shuzhi>7</> seconds.
